message_text: Hey team - getting reports of payment gateway timeouts. Anyone else seeing this?
@Mike Wilson Yeah I'm on it. Created INC-2024-001 to track this. Looking at the logs now.
Thanks Sarah. What's the severity looking like? Should we page the payment team?
Currently HIGH priority. About 15% of transactions failing. I think we can handle this without escalating yet.
Found it! The timeout was set too low. Pushing config change now.
Nice work Sarah! Was this from the deployment last week?
@Lisa Chen Yeah looks like someone set it to 5s when we moved to the new infra. Should have been 15s.
All good now? Can we close INC-2024-001?
Yes closing it now. Will add a follow-up task to audit other service timeouts.
ðŸš¨ URGENT - Multiple users can't log in. Web and mobile both affected.
I'll take this. Creating incident now.
INC-2024-002 created - CRITICAL priority. Checking auth service health.
@David Brown Do you need backup on this? I can pull Robert in if needed.
Thanks John. Let me dig for 10 more mins. Seeing Redis errors in the logs.
@David Brown Redis cluster status looks normal from my end. Could be cache corruption?
Good call @Lisa Chen! Cache is definitely corrupted. Flushing it now.
Auth service restarted. @Thomas Garcia can you test login now?
Testing now... âœ… Login working! Customers should be good.
Great! Monitoring for 30 mins before I close this out.
Nice recovery David ðŸ‘
FYI - website performance is degrading. Dashboard shows high response times.
I see it. Creating INC-2024-003. Looking at the DB metrics now.
@Robert Taylor Need a hand? I'm free if you want me to check the backend APIs.
Thanks Sarah. DB is the bottleneck. Some queries taking 5+ seconds ðŸ˜¬
Found the culprit - inefficient JOINs in the product catalog queries. Optimizing now.
@Robert Taylor Is this affecting checkout? Getting questions from sales team.
@Jennifer Davis Checkout is slow but functional. Fix going out in 5 minutes.
âœ… Query optimization deployed. Page load times back to normal.
Good catch Robert! I'll add some automated tests for query performance.
Morning team! PSA: Email notifications broke after maintenance last night. Looking into it.
Created INC-2024-004. SMTP config got reset somehow.
Ugh maintenance windows always surprise us with something. Need help @Lisa Chen?
Nah I got this. Just restoring the config from backup. Should be quick.
Email service is back up. Sending test notifications to verify.
Got the test email @Lisa Chen. Looks good!
Perfect. Closing INC-2024-004. Also adding email config to our pre-maintenance checklist.
Hey team - getting user complaints about cart items not saving. This is a big one.
Oh no. On it. Creating incident.
INC-2024-005 created. @Jennifer Davis How widespread is this?
Support has 12 tickets in the last hour. This is hurting conversions.
@Robert Taylor Bumping this to HIGH priority. Let us know if you need more resources.
Thanks John. Digging into session management code now.
@Robert Taylor I worked on session stuff last sprint. Want me to jump in?
That would be awesome Sarah! I'm looking at the session token validation. Something's off.
Looking at it now. The token expiry logic changed in the last release.
Found it! Token validation is too strict. Working on a fix.
@Robert Taylor I can test this in staging if you push the fix.
@Amanda White Fix is in staging now. Test away!
Testing... cart persistence working in staging âœ… Ready to deploy?
@Robert Taylor @Sarah Johnson Deploy when ready. I'll monitor the metrics.
Heads up - SSL cert expires in 7 days. Renewing it now to avoid any drama.
Thanks for the heads up David! Are we still doing manual renewals or did we set up auto-renew?
Still manual unfortunately. That's on my Q1 roadmap though. Creating INC-2024-009 to track.
New cert deployed. Verifying across all services now.
@David Brown Load balancers showing the new cert. All good here.
âœ… All verified. Closing INC-2024-009. Will work on automation next quarter.
Great week team! Just a reminder - incident retrospective tomorrow at 2pm.
I'll have the INC-2024-001 post-mortem ready.
Same for INC-2024-002. We should talk about Redis monitoring improvements.
And I'll cover INC-2024-003 and INC-2024-005. Got some good learnings from the cart issue.
Quick question - is anyone else's monitoring alerts going crazy or is it just me?
Mine too! Looks like we're getting false positives on disk space.
OK good it's not just me. Probably need to tune those thresholds.
New customer escalation - premium client reporting intermittent API failures.
Creating INC-2024-010 for this. Which API endpoint @Mike Wilson?
The /api/v2/inventory endpoint. They say it's timing out about 20% of the time.
Checking the logs... seeing some timeouts but not 20%. @David Brown can you check from the security side?
On it. Checking if rate limiting is kicking in.
Yep - they're hitting rate limits. Their API key is at the default tier. @Jennifer Davis can we bump them up?
They're on Enterprise plan so yes. Bumping their rate limit to 1000 req/min now.
Customer confirmed it's working now. Thanks everyone!
Closing INC-2024-010. @Jennifer Davis we should probably audit other enterprise clients' rate limits.
Good teamwork today. MTTR is looking much better this month.
ðŸŽ‰ That automation we built is really paying off.
Speaking of automation - the cert renewal script is done. Testing it next week.
Nice @Lisa Chen! That'll save us so much time.
FYI - scheduled maintenance window this Saturday 2am-4am for database upgrades.
Thanks Amanda. Who's on-call Saturday in case something goes sideways?
I am. @Lisa Chen are you my backup?
Yep I got you covered @Sarah Johnson.
Random question - can someone point me to the incident tagging guidelines? Want to make sure I'm categorizing correctly.
@Maria Rodriguez They're in Confluence under 'Incident Management' > 'Tagging Guide'. I'll pin it in this channel.
Perfect thanks @John Smith!
Maintenance update: DB upgrade completed successfully. No issues to report.
Smooth sailing! Good job Sarah ðŸ’ª
Excellent work @Sarah Johnson. Love when maintenance goes as planned.
Heads up - seeing some weird behavior with the new DB version. Search queries are slower.
Oh no. Creating incident. @Robert Taylor What's the performance delta?
About 2x slower on full-text search. Other queries are fine.
INC-2024-011 created. Checking if we need to rebuild search indexes.
Yep that's it. Indexes need rebuilding after major version upgrades. Doing that now.
Index rebuild complete. @Robert Taylor Can you test search again?
Testing... âœ… Back to normal speed. Actually maybe even faster than before!
Sweet! The new version has better indexing. Closing INC-2024-011.
Anyone else getting Slack notifications for every. single. incident. update? ðŸ˜…
YES. My phone is buzzing nonstop.
Ha! Yeah we probably need to tune the notification settings. I'll look into it.
Maybe only notify on critical/high priority incidents?
Good idea @David Brown. I'll update the integration settings.
BTW anyone want to grab lunch and do a mini knowledge share on monitoring best practices?
